snippet.title: Disobedient dog plays dead in front of large crowed and embarrassed owner on the Gold Coast
snippet.content:
A cheeky Golden Retriever wasn't going to move for anyone. Picture: Kristen Bohlsen/Facebook
Staff writersNews Corp Australia Network
Share
A CHEEKY golden retriever has caused its owner all sorts of embarrassment by playing dead and refusing to budge in front of a large crowd on the Gold Coast. Video shows the disobedient dog refusing to follow his owner while out on a walk.
The dog, clearly not wanting to move, flops onto the ground and won't budge. For almost a minute, the owner tries to tug the canine along on the lead. At one point, the visibly frustrated pet owner stretches out the animal's floppy front leg in an attempt to make him move.
He ain't moving. Picture: Kristen Bohlsen/FacebookSource:Supplied
The dog isn't going anywhere. Picture: Kristen BohlsenSource:Supplied The crowd milling around are seen smiling, laughing and pulling out their phones to capture the beachside stand-off.
It's a stand-off as the embarrassed owner tries to get his cheeky dog to move. Picture: Kristen BohlsenSource:Supplied The cheeky mutt finally responds to his owner's call to come after being let off the lead, earning a rapturous applause from the crowd.
The dog gets a round of applause from amused onlookers. Picture: Kristen Bohlsen/FacebookSource:Supplied
